Georgina needs a loan of 1000 soles to invest in buying gasoline. Georgina’s dream is to expand her business and to secure the future of her children.

loans.use: To buy groceries, gasoline, diversifying a business.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon lives in Napisik, Sulipat Calamba Misamis Ocidental. She is thirty-one years old and married with one child. She owns and operates a business selling sand and gravel for use in construction. She has been engaged in this business for more than four years, earning about $90 a month.

Currently, Corazon is requesting a loan of 10,000PHP that will be used as additional capital for her business.

loans.use: As additional capital for her sand and gravel business

loans.name: Bimarziya

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Бимарзия уже шестой год кредитуется для расширения бизнеса откорма и продажи скота.Она на каждый полученный кредит обнавляет свой домашний скот.В основном у неё быки и коровы.за кредитный период она смогла расширить хлев где она смотрит скот.У неё сейчас три коровы и пара баранов.На следующий займ она планирует купить ещё пару бычков. В день мониторинга Бимарзии не было дома, поэтому на снимке её муж.На предыдущих фото Бимарзия была всегда сама.
texts.en:
For six years now, Bimarziya has been taking out loans in order to expand her business of feeding and selling cattle. With each loan, she has purchased new cattle for her herd. Mostly, she has bulls and cows. With one loan, she was able to expand the barn where she feeds her cattle. She now has three cows and a couple of sheep. With the next loan, she plans to purchase a couple of bulls. On the day of the monitoring, Bimarziya wasn't home, therefore, her husband in the photo. Bimarzia was always in the previous photos.

Translated from Russian by Josh Machleder, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: feeding and sale of cattle

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар Ташарипова проживает в Гиссарском районе. Возраст 40 лет. Вдова, имеет 2 детей. Дилбар более 5 лет занимается бизнесом. Она имеет торговую точку, где торгует разными мелочами, т.е. мороженым, напитками и т.д. Ей в этом также помогают ее дети. Кредит просит для увеличения товараоборота.
texts.en:
Dilbar T. lives in the Gissar region. She is 40 years old. She is a widow and has two children. Dilbar has been doing business for more than five years. She has a retail spot where she sells all kinds of small stuff such as ice cream, drinks and etc. Her children also help her in this. She is asking for a loan to increase turnover of goods.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase turnaround

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 23 años, es una joven muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en la casa de sus padres, a quienes desea ayudar en los gastos del hogar, es por eso que está dispuesta a trabajar muy duro. El puesto de quesos de Rosa está ubicado en el mercado Santa Bárbara (mercado importante de la ciudad de Juliaca), ella es una vendedora muy carismática y sencilla que siempre atiende a sus clientes con una sonrisa en los labios. Lo que más le gusta de su negocio es conversar con sus vecinas de venta, lleva 3 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es conseguir los quesos más sabrosos, ya que ella tiene una reputación muy bien ganada y la gente sabe que sus quesos son muy cotizados. Para un futuro cercano espera tener una tienda muy grande donde pueda vender muchos más productos y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos, con los cuales pueda dar a sus padres una vejez tranquila. Este es el cuarto préstamo de Rosa con MFP y tiene muchas ganas de pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, igual como hizo con sus anteriores créditos. Ella es una persona muy alegre y querida en su banco comunal y espera poder seguir trabajando bien con todas sus compañeras. Los mil nuevos soles solicitados planea invertirlos en la compra de más quesos, con los cuales espera incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 23, is young, very happy and a worker. She lives in her parents’ house, and she wants to help with the household expenses. That’s why she is determined to work very hard. Rosa’s cheese stand is located in the Santa Bárbara Market (an important market in the city of Juliaca). She is a very charismatic and candid saleswoman who always waits on her customers with a smile on her lips. What she likes most about her business is conversing with her neighbors in the market. She has been involved in this activity for three years and considers the most difficult part of her job obtaining the tastiest cheeses since she has a well-earned reputation and people know her cheeses are highly sought-after. In the near future, she hopes to have a very large shop in which she can sell many more products and, thus, improve her income so that she can give her parents a peaceful old age.

This is Rosa’s fourth loan with MFP, and she is committed to making her payments on time, just as she has done with prior loans. She is a very happy person and beloved in her community bank, and she hopes to be able to continue working well with all her colleagues. She plans to invest the 1000 New Soles applied for in the purchase of more cheeses with which she hopes to increase her earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase in inventory
